item.description:
The time has come to support the candidate who has stood up for our Constitutional freedoms for over 30 years. That’s Ron Paul. He will end the NDAA, CISPA, balance the budget, defend this country and will not sell us out.

PLEDGE HERE – http://riseforliberty.com/
Donatio...n location - http://ronpaul2012.com/
Like our page - http://www.facebook.com/riseforliberty

On May 17th, it’s time to stand up against the attacks on our civil liberties by pledging our support for the only candidate in any party that will truly end the NDAA, CISPA, “Patriot Act” and other attacks on our freedoms. It’s time to rise for liberty and support Ron Paul!

What is a Money Bomb? - The "Rise for Liberty" Money Bomb is a 24 hour "Online" fundraising event promoted completely by the Grassroots. On May 17th, all donations are made securely to the official campaign at http://ronpaul2012.com/.

PLEASE INVITE YOUR FRIENDS!
item.name: Rise for Liberty Money Bomb
